'''Robert Pugh''' (born 16 August 1950) is a Welsh actor. Pugh is known for his roles in ''[[wikipedia:The Ghost Writer (film)|The Ghost Writer]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World|Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World]]'', as well as numerous other TV and film credits.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he plays [[Craster]], the master of [[Craster's Keep]], a sordid place beyond [[the Wall]]. He was confirmed in the role on August 10, 2011.<ref>[http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/live-feed/game-thrones-meet-craster-220687 Hollywood Reporter]</ref> He joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 2|second season]], and he remained a guest star in the [[Season 3|third season]].
